comments: GHSA-4jv9-3563-23j3 - this is a SQL injection vulnerability that only affects MySQL see https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-4jv9-3563-23j3, https://github.com/knex/knex/issues/1227 & https://www.ghostccamm.com/blog/knex_sqli/

GHSA-hc6q-2mpp-qw7j:Webpack 5 before 5.76.0 does not avoid cross-realm object access. ImportParserPlugin.js mishandles the magic comment feature. An attacker who controls a property of an untrusted object can obtain access to the real global object. https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-hc6q-2mpp-qw7j
